data.text: @ChiropteraMHz I wish you get well soon too! Thanks! And yes, I believe they have to stay home for five days AND at least 24 hours with no symptoms after that. Until then we're contagious.
@ClipsIced Nice. I am vaccinated but I could even die without the vaccine, who knows. I am very optimistic since I have 3 vaccines so far.
The test result makes for a nice decor item below my TV 😂
@TheSimArchitect Unvaccinated and my symptoms were milder then a seasonal cold during covid infection. Goodluck
